name: Volkstein
description: Ouvbane, a vicious demonic trickster, has come back to life. And only Cauflin can stop him. Why? Because why not? He doesn't really want to. He'd rather stay home, but Ouvbane took his wife. And she brings home the bacon. And Cauflin really doesn't want to get a job.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory, shader model 3.0+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Only supported on 1920 x 1080 , 1280 x 720 , 1360 x 768 resolutions
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
